DOC.brief_title: APTIMA HPV 16 18/45 Genotype Assay TIGRIS DTS System Women With ASC-US Negative Pap Test Results
DOC.detailed_description: The APTIMA HPV 16 18/45 Genotype Assay ( AHPV-GT Assay ) vitro nucleic acid amplification test qualitative detection E6/E7 viral messenger RNA ( mRNA ) human papillomavirus ( HPV ) type 16 , 18 45 cervical specimen woman positive result APTIMA HPV Assay . The AHPV-GT Assay differentiate sample positive HPV 16 positive HPV 18 and/or 45 , differentiate HPV 18-positive sample HPV 45-positive sample . Cervical specimen collect ThinPrep Pap Test vial contain PreservCyt Solution ( Hologic , Inc. , Marlborough , Massachusetts ) commercially available collection device ( broom-type collection device cytobrush/spatula combination ) may test AHPV-GT Assay either pre- post-Pap processing . The assay use TIGRIS DTS ( TIGRIS ) System . In ASC-US Study Adjunct Study population , objective : - evaluate performance characteristic AHPV-GT Assay detect cervical disease woman APTIMA HPV Assay positive result - evaluate ability AHPV-GT Assay detect HPV high-risk type 16 , 18 , 45 woman APTIMA HPV Assay positive result .
